originalText.text: Been going here all my life and every single time I have been, I have received a fantastic haircut! The customer service is also fantastic, Fior will treat you well, have an great chat with you, and then give you a superb cut!! 5/5 stars for the best barber in New York!

text.text: Been going here all my life and every single time I have been, I have received a fantastic haircut! The customer service is also fantastic, Fior will treat you well, have an great chat with you, and then give you a superb cut!! 5/5 stars for the best barber in New York!

originalText.text: I haven’t had my hair cut since before the pandemic, and my hair became an unmanageable nightmare. Jaico hair salon was the FIRST place I went when I stepped back outside. The owner always does a great job with the cut, and has helpful tips for managing my hair. This will always be my favorite spot. Never disappoints!

text.text: I haven’t had my hair cut since before the pandemic, and my hair became an unmanageable nightmare. Jaico hair salon was the FIRST place I went when I stepped back outside. The owner always does a great job with the cut, and has helpful tips for managing my hair. This will always be my favorite spot. Never disappoints!

originalText.text:
I left this salon in tears, and cried for another week. Avoid it.
I was trying to grow my hair after a catastrophe that left it badly broken. I was already mentally down, but I needed the tips to be even. I specifically asked her to cut as little as possible and not touch the awful layers. She didn't listen and did the opposite and cut off everything I had grown in 5 long months. She left me with a dated 90s style that I hated. So that was $50 that made my depression worse.
Bonus: the whole time she tried to sell me her awful homemade juice!

originalText.text: Fior is the best in the city. It takes a long time before I trust anyone to cut, style, or color my hair and I trust her completely. I have been to the high end salons and have not been pleased. I have NEVER been let down by Fior at Jaico. It is incredibly affordable, especially for the quality you are getting. She will go out of her way to fit you in when you want to come in. The salon is unassuming, but do not let that deter you.

text.text: Fior is the best in the city. It takes a long time before I trust anyone to cut, style, or color my hair and I trust her completely. I have been to the high end salons and have not been pleased. I have NEVER been let down by Fior at Jaico. It is incredibly affordable, especially for the quality you are getting. originalText.text: Few years ago I walked into Jaico Hair Salon (owner’s name is Fior) and never went to another salon after that. Fior is a perfectionist when it comes to hair and while her English may not be perfect (thus a negative review on her hanging up on someone likely because she didn’t hear or understand), she is professional and more importantly exceptional in what she does. Her hair salon does not look overdone or super fancy but I have had her do some complicated hairdos for weddings and other functions, and she impresses each time. She is the best hair stylist I have ever encountered which is why I felt compelled to write this review.
